articles.title: India vs Pakistan: "Chai Pakode...": Virender Sehwag's Ultimate Dig At Asia Cup Scheduling Is Gold | Cricket News - NDTV Sports
articles.description: The ongoing Asia Cup is being held under the hybrid model, with matches being played in Pakistan and Sri Lanka.
articles.content: Former India opening batter Virender Sehwag has taken a dig at the Asian Cricket Council (ACC) over the scheduling of the ongoing Asia Cup. Sehwag's comments came after the blockbuster game between I… [+1463 chars]
